thread.section_title: White, Jacobs & Associates Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of White, Jacobs & Associates | whitejacobs.com
thread.title: Jason Martinez
thread.title_full: White, Jacobs & Associates reviewed by Jason Martinez

author: Jason Martinez
title: Jason Martinez
text: From start to finish James was there for me. Explained the process and walked me step by step throughout the process. Even returned a call to me one night when I was feeling a little stressed about things. Never thought anyone would care as much as he did. Finally graduating the program and closing on the house of my dreams in 2 weeks Great experience and happy to say that I will tell everyone I know about him and White, Jacobs & Associates. A-1 in my book.
